law.catch_line: School furniture or supplies not to be sold by teachers or employees distributing books.
law.text: No teacher or school employee engaged in the distribution of textbooks under the provisions of KRS 157.100 to 157.170 shall sell, distribute, or in any way deal in any kind of school furniture or supplies for use in any public schools.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 179, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4421c-7.
